snippet: Making a good pizza is about three things: some confidence, practice and a food processor.
abstract: Mark Bittman How to Cook Everything column says that making a good pizza at home is about three things, some confidence, some practice and a good food processor; gives recipe for basic pizza dough.
lead_paragraph: Making a good pizza is about three things: some confidence, practice and a food processor.

headline.seo: For the Home Cook, Making a Better Pizza
headline.main: For Chefs at Home, a Pie Above the Rest
headline.print_headline: For Chefs at Home, A Pie Above the Rest
